name: Ardakilic/silex-skeleton-app
description: A silex skeleton app that includes Laravel's Eloquent ORM, PHPMig and Guzzle, also has a controller structure and a custom command

suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (~2.4).
suggest.fzaninotto/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (~1.4).
suggest.league/oauth2-server: A spec compliant, secure by default PHP OAuth 2.0 Server (~4.1).
suggest.predis/predis: Flexible and feature-complete PHP client library for Redis (~1.0)
suggest.league/flysystem: Abstraction for local and remote filesystems (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-rackspace: Required to use the Flysystem Rackspace driver (~1.0).
